name: Charlotte Perospero
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may trash 1 card from your hand: Declare a cost of your choice and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed cost is the same as the declared cost, draw 1 card and add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
